Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.job

Class JobOpeningServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.buffettinc.hrms.service.job.JobOpeningServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
JobOpeningService
@Service public class JobOpeningServiceImpl extends Object implements JobOpeningService
Service implementation for managing JobOpening in Buffett Inc. Implements methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete job openings. Provides operations related to job openings.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

    • createJobOpening

      public JobOpening createJobOpening(String title, String department, String description, LocalDate postingDate)
      Create a new job opening with the specified details.
      Specified by:
      createJobOpening in interface JobOpeningService
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the job opening
      department - the department of the job opening
      description - the description of the job opening
      postingDate - the posting date of the job opening
      Returns:
      the created job opening

      Returns:

    • updateJobOpening

      public JobOpening updateJobOpening(UUID jobID, String title, String department, String description, LocalDate postingDate)
      Update a job opening with new details.
      Specified by:
      updateJobOpening in interface JobOpeningService
      Parameters:
      jobID - the ID of the job opening to update
      title - the new title of the job opening
      department - the new department of the job opening
      description - the new description of the job opening
      postingDate - the new posting date of the job opening
      Returns:
      the updated job opening, or null if the job opening with the specified ID is not found

    • deleteJobOpening

      public boolean deleteJobOpening(UUID jobID)
      Delete a job opening with the specified ID.
      Specified by:
      deleteJobOpening in interface JobOpeningService
      Parameters:
      jobID - the ID of the job opening to delete
      Returns:
      true if the job opening is successfully deleted, false otherwise
